thread.section_title: Link Interactive Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Link Interactive | linkinteractive.com
thread.title: Michael Castellano
thread.title_full: Link Interactive reviewed by Michael Castellano

author: Michael Castellano
title: Michael Castellano
text: I use Link Interactive. Got the equipment through my Costco membership and have ordered additional equipment over time. First off, the monthly monitoring fee is highly competitive. Second, the equipment works great and is versatile. Third, I like that I can install it and update the system myself. Fourth, their service is great -- prompt responses to emails, get a person on the phone, they will program things remotely if you ask them to. Fifth, the integration with alarm.com works seamlessly and adds significant value. I am not kidding, I actually love my alarm company and cannot recommend the whole experience highly enough.
